page.title: 08Costock C of E Primary
page.content: The school has 75 children on roll. There are three classes;{Infants, {Lower Juniors}and{Upper Juniors.}The school only has two classrooms,the Upper Juniors have their lessons in the hall.There were other schools in Rempstone and Wysall but they have closed down now and the children come to Costock by bus. School starts at 9 am. and we have assembly every morning.At midday we have our dinner in the school hall.After dinner we go out to play until 1.15pm. On Wednesday we have{P.E.}in the afternoon.Tuesday mornings the Juniors go swimming.The main subjects are{ {English}and{Maths.}We also do{ {art,painting,sewing}and{work on the {computer.}At 3.25pm. we pack up and go home.
